messages.message: Hmm…maybe Redis is misconfigured in the initial tests? On laptops, the host is localhost but in crafting the host is called “redis”

Managed to fix this with a combination of restarting the sandbox, installing redis server, rebuilding tests and reinstalling poetry. I suspect some of those aren’t related, but at least it’s working now :shrug:
Hm shouldn’t have to do any of that. Can you send me the exact command you ran? I’ll take a look.
For the crafting sandboxes in general: if it doesn’t work out of the box, it’s a bug in the sandbox!

Sure;

Restarting the sandbox was done through the crafting UI
Installing redis server: `sudo apt-get install redis-server`
Rebuilding tests: `make test`
Re-installing poetry: `poetry install`

I also restarted cursor, but I suspect that's not related
I meant: which command didn’t work initially? Make test in api-server?
